4902B. Loss of use damages prohibited [For applicability of this section, see 84 Del. Laws, c. 363, § 3].(a) Damages incurred by rental companies for the loss of use of a rental vehicle and related administrative fees shall not be recovered from any renter, authorized driver, or the renter’s or authorized driver’s insurer. Nothing in this section shall be construed as prohibiting recovery of loss of use damages from negligent third parties.(b) Any rental agreement or other contract inconsistent with the provisions of this section shall be deemed void as against public policy.84 Del.
